meanings.definition: A small body of water where fish are kept for decorative purposes.
meanings.sent1: The backyard fishpond added a touch of tranquility to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The koi fish in the fishpond swam gracefully among the lily pads.
meanings.sent3: The fish in the fishpond seemed to have their own underwater dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a fishpond, deep and mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The sound of water trickling in the fishpond was soothing to the ears.
